label: Cookie Policy
title: Cookie Policy
summary: Our Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.

paragraphs.heading: Introduction
paragraphs.section: This Cookie Policy ('Policy') explains how Paisr Technologies uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website, use our platform, or access our services. It explains what these technologies are, why we use them, and your rights to control their use.

paragraphs.heading: What Are Cookies?
paragraphs.section: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They are widely used to enhance user experiences, enable functionalities, and gather information about how websites are used. Paisr used the following types of cookies:

bullets.title: Essential Cookies:
points: These cookies are necessary for the operation of our website and platform. They enable core functionalities such as security, authentication, and accessibility.

bullets.title: Performance and Analytics Cookies:
points: These cookies collect information about how visitors interact with our website and platform. We use this data to improve user experience and optimize our services.

bullets.title: Functional Cookies:
points: These cookies remember your preferences and choices, such as language settings and region, to enhance your experience.

paragraphs.heading: Why Do We Use Cookies?
paragraphs.section: We use cookies and similar technologies for various purposes, including:
points: To provide and maintain our services
To improve, personalize, and expand our services
To understand and analyze how you use our services
To develop new products, services, features, and functionality
To communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the service
To process your transactions and send you related information, including purchase confirmations and invoices

paragraphs.heading: Third-Party Cookies
paragraphs.section: We may also use third-party cookies from trusted partners to help us analyze and improve our services. These third parties may collect information about your online activities over time and across different websites. These cookies are governed by the respective privacy policies of the third parties.

bullets.title: Posthog:
points: We use Posthog to analyze user behavior and improve our services. Posthog may set cookies on your device to collect information about your interactions with our website and platform.

bullets.title: Other Third-Party Services:
points: We may use other third-party services that may set cookies on your device. We encourage you to review their privacy policies for more information.

paragraphs.heading: Your Choices
paragraphs.section: You have the right to control the use of cookies on your device. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse or delete cookies, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our website and platform.

paragraphs.heading: Data Collection and Use
paragraphs.section: We may collect and process personal data through cookies, including but not limited to:

paragraphs.heading: Retention of Data
paragraphs.section: We retain cookie data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Policy, or as required by law. You can delete cookies at any time through your browser settings.

paragraphs.heading: Changes to the Policy
paragraphs.section: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Policy on our website. We encourage you to review this Policy periodically for any updates.

paragraphs.heading: Contact Us
paragraphs.section: If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at: privacy@paisr.tech.
paragraphs.footer: By using our website and platform, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this Policy.
